thread.title: Beyoncé has a secret Snapchat, and people are totally going crazy trying to find it
thread.title_full: Beyoncé has a secret Snapchat, and people are totally going crazy trying to find it

author: Alim Kheraj
title: Beyoncé has a secret Snapchat, and people are totally going crazy trying to find it
text:
Beyoncé has a secret Snapchat, and people are totally going crazy trying to find it THIS IS NOT A DRILL! Beyoncé has a secret Snapchat , and people are so desperate to find it that they’re absolutely and hilariously freaking out.
Yesterday (February 23rd) was a big news day for Queen B. The singer, who recently revealed she’s expecting twins , pulled out of her headline slot at this year’s Coachella , much to the chagrin of festival goers and fans . Saying that, however, the singer and her management did announce that she planned to headline the festival in 2018 once those Beybies are born.
What’s more, Bey also broke her self-imposed social media silence yesterday to support transgender youth , and we love that she’s speaking up on this important matter. 
& #LGBTQ students need to know we support them. Share your support to #protecttransyouth at glsen.org/100days & put #KindnessInAction GLSEN 
Posted by Beyoncé on  Thursday, February 23, 2017 However, there’s one more thing that has the Beyhive in a tizzy. Yesterday Beyoncé shared a rare candid picture on to Instagram with her daughter Blue Ivy and it had Snapchat filters on it.

A post shared by Beyoncé (@beyonce) on Feb 23, 2017 at 2:07pm PST 
Now, as far as we know, Beyoncé doesn’t have a public Snapchat account, but it seems that this photo proves otherwise. In fact, Bey is pretty private when it comes to how she presents herself, just take a look at her baby bump photoshoots (yes there were multiple). Basically, if Beyoncé doesn’t want us to know something then, well, we won’t
Yet that hasn’t stopped members of the Beyhive hilariously losing it on social media.
WHATS YOUR SNAPCHAT? @Beyonce pic.twitter.com/HKAP6pc5Gk 
— Fatima (@ANTlFatima) February 23, 2017 We can do this the easy way, or the hard way. What is your snapchat? @Beyonce pic.twitter.com/qwtzxxC8hx 
— bk (@BeeKaY_NY) February 23, 2017 Can't believe Beyoncé just invented Snapchat.
— Josh (@J_Manasa) February 23, 2017 @beyonce we'll find that snapchat username one day pic.twitter.com/lwhqWiBLPY 
— Beyoncé Legend (@BeyonceLegend) February 24, 2017 Seeing Beyoncé with this Snapchat filter pic.twitter.com/PWWcWJuS6P 
— Her. (@TheHarperMiles) February 24, 2017 we must all come together as brothers and sisters and find beyonce's snapchat
— jacqueline (@AsToldByJackie) February 24, 2017 LOL
When you find out @Beyonce has a Snapchat and no one knows it except for her circle pic.twitter.com/CwqWrwvz9I 
— Tyrique Coney (@tu_Zer0) February 24, 2017 I need Beyoncé's Snapchat name pic.twitter.com/9AddOo9yOM 
— GagaLovesBey (@BeyLovesGaga) February 24, 2017 @Snapchat you have until the end of the day to give us Beyoncé's username. pic.twitter.com/qonvxlFm2A 
— Beyonce's 3rd heart (@xxjewelsndrugs) February 23, 2017 Did anyone find Beyonce's Snapchat name yet?! pic.twitter.com/dRYYXTQmPI 
— Oscar (@oscarGosei) February 24, 2017 Tina: ''Beyoncé doesn't have a snapchat account.''

Beyoncé: *posts a pic with a snapchat filter*

Tina: pic.twitter.com/PhiOYz2OX4 
— (@lDONTGIVEAFUCK) February 23, 2017 Given how secretive Beyoncé is about her life, her career, and, well, pretty much everything, we feel that it’s unlikely that we’ll ever get to find out what her Snapchat username, no matter how much the Beyhive hunt for it.
In fact, we’d pretty much bet that, unless Beyoncé were to release a new visual album on the platform, we’ll never have an answer to this mystery.
